summaries: * i'm Tristan. I'm a full-stack developer with over three years of experience designing, developing, and implementing solutions using a vast range of technologies and programming languages. Because of my professional experience in developing high-quality applications, I can confidently understand the majority of languages and services.
* Dans mes temps libres j'aime faire le vélo de montagne, enseigner la programmation, et de construire mes propres projets!

projects.title: Simpson Research
projects.description: Simpson Research is my organization dedicated to teaching advanced programming techniques

projects.title: Reborn Anti Cheat
projects.description: Reborn is a secure gaming anti-cheat written in Rust and is the superior to Versa, my other anti-cheat developed in Python

projects.title: Hermes
projects.description: Hermes is a lightning-fast full-text-search and caching system. Perform full-text-searches in 10-300µs!

projects.title: Verlet
projects.description: Verlet is a physics engine written from scratch and developed in C++ and Python.

projects.title: Athena
projects.description: Athena is a discord matchmaking bot with a fully functional caching system, MySQL database, dozens of commands, and more!

projects.title: CGL
projects.description: CGL is an easy-to-use, custom, and lightweight graphics library written in C/C++. It's simplicity was inspired by PyGame.
